## Solution:
$f \big(x \big) = \frac{x}{e^x}, \ g \big(x \big)= \log x\\ =\frac{2x^3 e^x -3x^3 x^2 e^x +x^5 e^x +12x^3 e^x x^2+6x^4 e^x -x^5 e^x-6x^3 e^x}{(x^2-3x+2)^2}=\frac{7x^4 e^x-26x^3 e^x +12x^2 e^x+8x e^x}{(x^2-3x+2)^2}$
$f \big(2 \big)= \frac{32 e^2-16 e^2 +4 e^2+2e^2}{9-6+2)^2}= \frac {32 e^2-12 e^2+2 e^2 }{5^2}=\frac {26e^2} {25}=2.60\\\\ f ' \big(x \big)=\frac { (14x^3 e^x -3x^3 (2x e^x)+(5x^4 e^x-x^4 e^x))}{\big( x^2-3x+2 \big)^2} $
  $=( \frac{28x^3 e^x -6x^3 e^x+12x^2 e^x-4x^2 e^x)}{(x^2-3x+2)^2} =\frac {35x^3 e^x -4x^2 e^x}{(x^2-3x+2)^2} = \frac {e^x \big( 35x^2 +8 x -4/( 2-3x+x^2 \big)}{(x^2-3x+2)^2}$
